predicate.note: Frames file for 'mess' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Bungling (mess up).

example.name: don't mess with Texas
example.text: Should they, too, stop [*-1] ``messing with'' his free market?

example.name: now that's clever
example.text: He said the Chaos Computer Club, of West Germany, once managed to invade SPAN and do such things as change the value of pi, [*] messing up some calculations.
example.note: causer is properly the act of changing the value of pi.
